i1.name: Guerrilla Warfare
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Teemo''' gains {{tip|invisibility}} after {{fd|1.5}} seconds of not moving, taking damage, performing actions that [[Stealth#Breaking_stealth|break stealth]], {{tip|channel|channeling}}, and being in {{tip|stasis}}. '''Teemo''' will remain invisible so long as he does not move or act, and is not {{tip|airborne|displaced}}. If within {{tip|brush}}, '''Teemo''' gains invisibility after {{fd|1.5}} seconds even while moving and may do so freely within its boundaries without breaking stealth.

{{sbc|Innate - Element of Surprise:}} When '''Teemo''' breaks stealth, he gains the ''Element of Surprise'' for 3 seconds, granting him {{sti|{{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|4|key=%|20 to 80|1;5;10;15}} '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Teemo gains invisibility after 1.5 seconds of not moving, taking damage, performing actions that Stealth#Breaking_stealth, channeling, and being in stasis. Teemo will remain invisible so long as he does not move or act, and is not displaced. If within brush, Teemo gains invisibility after 1.5 seconds even while moving and may do so freely within its boundaries without breaking stealth.Innate - Element of Surprise: When Teemo breaks stealth, he gains the Element of Surprise for 3 seconds, granting him Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 4 key=% 20 to 80 1;5;10;15 bonus attack speed.
i1.notes:
* If '''Teemo''' triggers ''Element of Surprise'' twice in less than 3 seconds he will only refresh the {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed's}} duration (it will not [[stack]] with itself).
* {{tip|Charm}}, {{tip|Flee}}, and {{tip|Taunt}} will ''force'' him out of {{tip|stealth}}.
** If '''Teemo''' is in a {{tip|brush}} while stealthed, only {{tip|Taunt}} will break it.
* ''Guerilla Warfare's'' stealth is special-cased to be interrupted whenever '''Teemo''' moves from his location by any means (whether by {{tip|dash|dashing}}, {{tip|blink|blinking}}, being {{tip|airborne|displaced}}, or simply moving), thus, performing actions that do not normally [[Stealth#Breaking stealth|break stealth]] which also involve movement will cause the {{tip|invisibility}} to break. Notably, {{si|Flash}} and {{si|Teleport}}. If '''Teemo''' is in a {{tip|brush}} the aforementioned spells do not end the stealth so long as his exact destination is still inside brush.
** Starting {{sis|Teleport}} channel will not break ''Guerilla Warfare'', only the {{tip|blink}} upon completing the channel will (with the exception stated above).
* ''Guerilla Warfare'' will not activate while {{si|Recall|Recalling}}.

q1.name: Blinding Dart
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Teemo''' shoots a dart at the target enemy, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|blind|blinding}} them for a few seconds. The {{tip|blind|blind's}} base duration is doubled against {{tip|minion|minions}} and {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Teemo shoots a dart at the target enemy, dealing them magic damage and blinding them for a few seconds. The blind's base duration is doubled against minions and monsters.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 260}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}{{st|Blind Duration|{{ap|1.5 to 2.5}}|Increased Blind|{{ap|1.5*2 to 2.5*2}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Blinding Dart'' will not make abilities that can trigger [[on-hit effect]]s ({{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}}, {{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}) miss.
* When blinded, enemies have a green tint on their screen.
* Because ''Blinding Dart'' uses {{tip|center range}}, it has 45 to 70 more range than his {{tip|basic attack|basic attacks}}, which use {{tip|edge range}}, against other {{tip|champions}}.
** This bonus becomes lower if '''Teemo''' or his target have [[size]] bonuses.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 260}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}{{st|Blind Duration|{{ap|1.5 to 2.5}}|Increased Blind|{{ap|1.5*2 to 2.5*2}}}}
effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 80% AP)
  • Blind Duration:
  • Increased Blind:

w1.name: Move Quick
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Teemo''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} if he hasn't taken damage from enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} or {{tip|turret|turrets}} for 5 seconds.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Teemo''' doubles his {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} for 3 seconds and prevents it from being disabled by damage for the duration.
''Casting Move Quick does not break {{ais|Guerrilla Warfare|Teemo}} stealth nor reset its fade into it.''
w1.descriptionHtml: Passive: Teemo gains bonus movement speed if he hasn't taken damage from enemy champions or turrets for 5 seconds.Active: Teemo doubles his bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and prevents it from being disabled by damage for the duration.Casting Move Quick does not break Guerrilla Warfare's stealth nor reset its fade into it.
w1.notes:
* When ''Move Quick's'' active bonus movement speed ends '''Teemo''' will not regain the passive one if he was damaged during the active's duration.
*''Move Quick's'' passive will be disabled even if the damage is blocked with a {{tip|spell shield}}.

e1.name: Toxic Shot
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Teemo's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|poison}} his target.
{{tip|poison|Poisoned}} targets suffer {{as|magic damage}} for 4 seconds, with subsequent attacks refreshing the {{tip|poison|poison's}} duration.
The '''total''' damage is increased by 50% against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
e1.descriptionHtml: Passive: Teemo's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and poison his target.Poisoned targets suffer magic damage for 4 seconds, with subsequent attacks refreshing the poison's duration.The total damage is increased by 50% against monsters.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage per Second|{{ap|6 to 30}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage Over Time|{{ap|6*4 to 30*4}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
{{st|Total Magic Damage in a Single Hit|{{ap|10+6*4 to 50+30*4}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* ''Toxic Shot's'' poison will trigger {{ais|Twin Fang|Cassiopeia}} bonus effects for {{ci|Cassiopeia}}.
* Toxic Shot deals {{tip|proc damage}}, but it has been special-cased to apply/refresh the bleed from {{ii|Hunter's Talisman}}.

effects.str: • Magic Damage On-Hit: (+ 30% AP)

{{st|Total Magic Damage in a Single Hit|{{ap|10+6*4 to 50+30*4}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}}}

r1.name: Noxious Trap
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Teemo''' stores a ''Noxious Trap'' charge periodically, up to a maximum amount at once.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Teemo''' tosses a poisonous mushroom at the target location which, upon landing, becomes {{tip|stealthed trap|stealthed}} after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 5 minutes and granting {{tip|sight}} of its surroundings. ''Noxious Trap'' bounces forward if it lands on top of another.

The mushroom will explode upon enemy contact, {{tip|poison|poisoning}} all nearby enemies and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them, {{tip|sight|revealing}} them, and dealing them {{as|magic damage}} over 4 seconds.
''Noxious Trap'' has {{sti|health|{{as|6 '''maximum''' health}}}} and can only be damaged by {{tip|champion}} [[basic attack]]s (2 damage from {{tip|ranged}} and 3 from {{tip|melee}}).
r1.descriptionHtml: Passive: Teemo stores a Noxious Trap charge periodically, up to a maximum amount at once.Active: Teemo tosses a poisonous mushroom at the target location which, upon landing, becomes stealthed after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 5 minutes and granting sight of its surroundings. Noxious Trap bounces forward if it lands on top of another.The mushroom will explode upon enemy contact, poisoning all nearby enemies and slowing them, revealing them, and dealing them magic damage over 4 seconds.Noxious Trap has 6 maximum health and can only be damaged by champion basic attacks (2 damage from ranged and 3 from melee).
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage per Second|{{ap|200/4 to 450/4}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|200 to 450}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}{{st|Slow|{{ap|30 to 50}}%}}
r1.notes:
* The bounce can occur an indefinite amount of times while '''Teemo''' is alive. If '''Teemo''' dies before ''Noxious Trap'' bounces on another, the trap will disappear.
* {{ui|Rift Scuttler}} will not trigger ''Noxious Trap's'' explosion if it is not being attacked.
* ''Noxious Trap's'' poison will trigger {{ais|Twin Fang|Cassiopeia}} bonus effects for {{ci|Cassiopeia}}.
* Enemies who step on multiple ''Noxious Traps'' will only refresh the poison's duration (their damage does not stack).
* ''Noxious Trap's'' damage is determined when it detonates and not when planted, meaning if '''Teemo's''' {{sti|AP|{{as|ability power}}}} changes, the scaling is also altered to affect the active damage of all ''Noxious Traps'' so long as they do not explode.
* ''Noxious Trap'' can be targeted by any allied {{si|Teleport}}. The trap will not become {{tip|invulnerable}} and its detonation (if the teleportation is already {{tip|channel|channeling}} when so) will not be canceled.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the {{tip|poison}} (self and allied) and the {{tip|slow}} but will not prevent the detonation itself.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Magic Damage per Second|{{ap|200/4 to 450/4}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|200 to 450}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}{{st|Slow|{{ap|30 to 50}}%}}
